name: Kata~Heartii
description:
"So, you want to learn how to make love?"

Kata~Heartii is a game about rolling up things to grow your love! Which is to say, your ball.

This game was made as a birthday present in under a month! We started the project on December 15, 2020 and "completed" it on January 11, 2021.

Controls

WASD — Move Ball

Arrow Keys — Move Camera

Credits

Concept & Art — KobaDesu

Programming — FoxBall/aaaddd

Sound —
"Lift Off", "Seas of Mars" by Jahzzar (freemusicarchive.org), used under CC-BY-SA 3.0. Slight edits were made in the form of cutting out silence at the end of the tracks.
"Feel the Funk" by Jimmy Fontanez / Media Rights Productions (youtube.com), used under a Royalty Free license.
All sound effects by MixKit (mixkit.co), used under the MixKit Free Sound Effects License.

You can also find these in game! Try rolling around the main menu ;)

Known Issues

  • The camera collisions are not great, and can cause it to "spaz" out. Mild seizure warning!
  • The ball can be bouncy and a bit harder to control at larger sized. Weird physics engine stuff.
  • Objects such as the Golf Ball may not get attached properly.
  • Minor graphical bugs on Linux.

There may be small patches in the future to fix the above-present issues, but aside from that this game is complete! We hope you enjoy it!

Made in Godot!
